alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 8:43PM CDT until March 25 at 12:04PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee affecting Clay County. Luxapallila Creek Near Columbus affecting Lowndes County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Farm land near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 28.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Wednesday was 28.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise and crest at 28.4 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Noxubee River Macon 26.0 28.2 Wed 8 pm CDT 25.8 22.6 20.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 845 AM CDT.
